Export.Routine:
WWW121 ;WWW121;DT;PRUEFEN PRIMÄRSCHLUESSELFELDER;02.01.1998 #include COMSYS #include WWWConst ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| PRUEFEN PRIMÄRSCHLUESSELFELDER ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| DT 02.01.1998 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; ;PRUEFEN DER FELDER ;the QUIT:$GET(YKEY)="" NEW YY,YKEY1 SET YKEY1=$PIECE(YKEY,",",1) QUIT:YKEY1="" SET YY(1)="" FOR SET YY(1)=$ORDER(^WWW121(0,YKEY1,YY(1))) QUIT:YY(1)="" DO ;UNTERSUCHEN FORMULAR PRIMÄSCHLUESEL ;examine form . IF '$DATA(^WWW127(0,YKEY1,"P",YY(1),SPRACHE,1)) SET ^WWW127(0,YKEY1,"P",YY(1),SPRACHE,1)="" . QUIT QUIT
Get(YFORM,YBBN) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; A common place to merge form primary key and customisation information. ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 10-Apr-2013 shobby IPIRANGA-103.1: Input Type ; 12-Aug-2011 shobby SR17840: HideRelationClassIDs ; 11-Feb-2010 shobby SR17139: Created ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
new objWWW121,objWWW121D,objWWW002,idClass,idClassField ;IPIRANGA-103.1
set objWWW121 =$get(^WWW121(0,YFORM,YBBN,1)) set objWWW121D =$get(^WWW121D(0,YFORM,YBBN,YM,1))
set idClass=$$$WWW120ClassUsedInForm($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1))) ;IPIRANGA-103.1 if idClass'="" { ;IPIRANGA-103.1 set idClassField = $$$GetClassField(YFORM,YBBN) ;IPIRANGA-103.1 if idClassField'="" { ;IPIRANGA-103.1 set objWWW002 =$get(^WWW002(0,idClass,idClassField,1)) ;IPIRANGA-103.1 if $$$WWW002InputType(objWWW002)'="" set $$$WWW121TypeOfAcquisition(objWWW121)=$$$WWW002InputType(objWWW002) ;IPIRANGA-103.1
if $$$WWW121RelationClass(objWWW121) = "" set $$$WWW121RelationClass(objWWW121) = $$$WWW002RelationClass(objWWW002) if $$$WWW121RelationPrimaryKeys(objWWW121) = "" set $$$WWW121RelationPrimaryKeys(objWWW121) = $$$WWW002RelationalPrimaryKeys(objWWW002) if $$$WWW121RelationalDisplayItems(objWWW121) = "" set $$$WWW121RelationalDisplayItems(objWWW121) = $$$WWW002RelationalDisplayItems(objWWW002)
} ;IPIRANGA-103.1 } ;IPIRANGA-103.1
if objWWW121D'="" { if $$$WWW121DDoNotShowPrimaryKey(objWWW121D)'="" set $$$WWW121DoNotShowPrimaryKey(objWWW121) =$$$WWW121DDoNotShowPrimaryKey(objWWW121D) if $$$WWW121DHideRelationClassIDs(objWWW121D)'="" set $$$WWW121HideRelationClassIDs(objWWW121)=$$$WWW121DHideRelationClassIDs(objWWW121D) } if $$$WWW121HideRelationClassIDs(objWWW121)="" set $$$WWW121HideRelationClassIDs(objWWW121)=$$HideRelationClassIDs^WWW012() quit objWWW121
OnAfterDelete(pYKEY) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Routine to run after deleting a form primary key ; ; Params: pYKEY : The YKEY ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 09-Sep-2008 shobby BR014980: COMHelp* information is now temporary data. ; 08-Nov-2006 Steve S SR14915: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;new strStatus,strRef,intField,strKey,idForm,idKey ;new idLangLoop
;set strStatus=$$$OK
;if $$GetKey^COMUtilClass(pYKEY,2,2,.idForm,.idKey) { ; set strRef = "P"_idKey ; set idLangLoop="" ; for { ; set idLangLoop = $order(^COMHelpFields(0,5,strRef,idForm,idLangLoop)) ; quit:(idLangLoop="") ; ; set intField = $order(^COMHelpFields(0,5,strRef,idForm,idLangLoop,"")) ; ; if (intField'="") { ; set strKey = idForm_","_idLangLoop_","_intField ; set strStatus = $$$Kill("COMHelpField",strKey) ; } ; } ;}
quit
OnAfterSave(pYKEY) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Routine to run after saving a primary key ; ; Params: pYKEY : The YKEY ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 09-Sep-2008 shobby BR014980: COMHelp* information is now temporary data. ; 08-Nov-2006 Steve S SR14915: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idForm,idKey,strStatus
set strStatus=$$$OK
;if $$GetKey^COMUtilClass(pYKEY,2,2,.idForm,.idKey) { ; set strStatus=$$LoadKey^COMHelpField(idForm,SPRACHE,idKey) ;}
do ^WWW121 // existing code
quit
HideRelationClassIDs(pYFORM,pidFormField) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check HideRelationClassIDs in WWW012 and WWW121. ; ; ByRef: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 12-Aug-2011 shobby SR17840 Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnHide,objWWW121
set blnHide=$$HideRelationClassIDs^WWW012()
if (pYFORM'="")&&(pidFormField'="") { set objWWW121=$get(^WWW121(0,pYFORM,pidFormField,1)) if $$$WWW121HideRelationClassIDs(objWWW121)'="" set blnHide=$$$WWW121HideRelationClassIDs(objWWW121) } quit blnHide
